name: poker-planning-2
description: Service to be able to play in agile game called porker planing

scripts.prod: cd shared && npm run prod && cd .. && cd frontend && npm run prod && cd .. && cd backend && npm run prod && cd .. && npm run copy-statics
scripts.after-install: cd frontend && npm i && cd .. && cd backend && npm i
scripts.after-ci: cd frontend && npm ci && cd .. && cd backend && npm ci
scripts.lint:staged: cd frontend && npm run lint:staged && cd .. && cd backend && npm run lint:staged
scripts.lint:prettier:fix: cd frontend && npm run lint:prettier:fix && cd .. && cd backend && npm run lint:prettier:fix

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint:staged && npm run patch-version
